name: Erbsen
plantInfo: Peas grow best in cool weather. They prefer well-drained soil and regular watering.

name: Kohlrabi
plantInfo: Kohlrabi thrives in cooler climates and requires consistent moisture for best growth.

name: Chili
plantInfo: Chili plants prefer warm and sunny environments. They need consistent moisture and good drainage.

name: Mangold
plantInfo: Chard prefers full sun and moist, fertile soil. It can tolerate partial shade.

name: Möhren
plantInfo: Carrots need loose, well-drained soil and consistent moisture for proper root development.

name: Radieschen
plantInfo: Radishes are fast-growing root vegetables that prefer cool weather and loose soil.

name: Rote Beete
plantInfo: Beets need moist, fertile soil and can tolerate a wide range of temperatures.

name: Salat
plantInfo: Lettuce prefers cool conditions and moist soil with good drainage.

name: Tomate
plantInfo: Tomatoes love full sun and warm weather. Keep the soil evenly moist but not soggy.

name: Zucchini
plantInfo: Zucchini grows fast in warm, sunny conditions with regular watering.
